title: This needs to be reportable
body: Spamming pings on a player should in fact be a reportable offense, as it is by far one of the most tilting things in league of legends, and you cant even do anything about it besides mute the pings, and then when you have an actual danger or mia ping you might not notice it if your in the middle of a fight

replies.body:
Why on earth would this bother you.

If this bothers you, you should not be playing multiplayer games, because you have way bigger issues to deal with than people spamming pings..

Actually in my eyes he's a better fit to playing multiplayer games than you are. Being sensitive to pings means that he's actually actively listening to his team and taking their feedback. When someone abuses that and you have no way of preventing that one person while allowing the other 3 members of your team to ping and communicate, it gets annoying.

Sorry, i forget most of the league community are passive-aggressive brats.

How does a brat with no control, who tilts himself enough to cry on the forums make him "more suitable" for multiplayer?
Ping volume, it is a setting that can be used. Of course, removing the issue would mean nothing to cry about, and we cant have that, now.

He's giving a suggestion to fix a problem which is a perfect use of the forums. At no point does he do anything to indicate that he's a "brat with no control" as unlike you he's not name calling any of the other players.

Ping volume is indeed a setting that can be used; however the point of it is that you shouldn't have to lose on the communication benefit with the 3 other players using pings correctly just to cover for the one person that's messing up. It's for the same reason that you are able to mute one player vs. your entire team.

The community decides what is punishable. If you think it's punishable report them for it. If they do it in every game and people report them for it they will be punished. It's all automated.

Ping spamming is harassment just like other forms of griefing.

It's not paid a lot of love by RIOT as it's difficult to detect but I hope with more accurate reports and some time they can manage the problem more effectively.
